sections.heading: General requirements for use of the right-of-way9-598
sections.text: General requirements for use of the right-of-wayStructures and facilities deployed by wireless providers pursuant to this article shall be constructed, maintained and located as to not obstruct, endanger or hinder the usual travel or public safet
